books.title: To Say Nothing of the Dog
books.author: Connie Willis
books.description: A time traveling romp with mystery, romance, and a hefty dose of irreverence.

books.title: Bloodchild and Other Stories
books.author: Octavia E. Butler
books.description: A collection of short stories by Octavia E. Butler, also including two essays.

books.title: Get Better at Anything
books.author: Scott Young
books.description: A second take on how learning works, this time with a focus on practical advice and general principles for getting better at anything.

books.title: The Tyranny of Merit
books.author: Michael Sandel
books.description: A critique of the focus on meritocracy in modern society claiming that even if we achieve perfect meritocracy, it will not lead to a more just or happy society.

books.title: Death Comes to Pemberley
books.author: PD James
books.description: A murder mystery set in the world of Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice.

books.title: Ultralearning
books.author: Scott Young
books.description: Scott Young's synthesis of the most effective principles of accelerated learning focusing on people achieving rapid improvement through specific projects.

books.title: A Brief History of Intelligence
books.author: Max S. Bennett
books.description: A history of the evoluntionary path that led to present day intelligence.

books.title: Legends and Lattes
books.author: Travis Baldree
books.description: A fun and low-stakes fantasy novel about a retired mercenary setting up a coffee shop and making friends along the way.

books.title: I, Robot
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.description: A collection of short stories about robots and their interactions with humanity connected by the theme of misalignment.

books.title: The Vital Question
books.author: Nick Lane
books.description: An investigation into the origin of life, abiogenesis, and the development of multicellular life following the adoption of the mitochondria.
